actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to maximize the availability of information on commercial bank credit uses.

summary.text: Credit Uses Reporting Act - Establishes a program of reporting on uses of commercial bank credit to be administered by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System. Specifies the uses of commercial bank credit to which this Act applies. Requires the Board to report semiannually to Congress on the uses of bank credit.

titles.title: A bill to maximize the availability of information on commercial bank credit uses.
